dt: {bc}not of, relating to, or common to a complex or organized body
{bc}not affecting the entire body {bc}of localized effect or nature

dt.t: a {wi}nonsystemic{/wi} drug acting solely within the intestine

dt: {bc}of, relating to, or being a pesticide that remains on the surface that it is applied to and acts through contact

dt.t: sprayed a {wi}nonsystemic{/wi} pesticide on the tomato plant

shortdef: not of, relating to, or common to a complex or organized body
not affecting the entire body : of localized effect or nature
